explains: n. （建筑用）黏土，黏土坯；土砖；土砖建筑
wordGroup: adobe flash 动画制作；FLASH动画制作软件
adobe flash player 一种多媒体播放器

sentences.en: Of course in early architecture—such as igloos and adobe structures—there was no such equipment, and the skeleton and skin were often one.
sentences.cn: 当然，在早期的建筑中——如冰屋和土坯结构——没有这样的设备，骨骼和皮肤通常是一体的。

sentences.en: Gharib has already been contacted by a civil engineer in Nicaragua, who wants to put up buildings with adobe roofs supported by concrete arches on a site that heavy equipment can't reach.
sentences.cn: 尼加拉瓜的一位土木工程师已经联系了加利普，这位工程师想在重型设备无法到达的地方建造由混凝土拱架支撑的土坯屋顶。

sentences.en: Oncorhynchus mykiss occurred historically in Adobe Creek.
sentences.cn: 虹鳟历史上出现在奥比多的小溪。
